title: Dutee Chand:Nobody Can Stop Dutee Chand! India's Sprint Sensation Breaks Her Own 100m Record On Her Way To A National Gold
text:
Nobody Can Stop Dutee Chand! India's Sprint Sensation Breaks Her Own 100m Record On Her Way To A National Gold

Nobody Can Stop Dutee Chand! India's Sprint Sensation Breaks Her Own 100m Record On Her Way To A National Gold

Dutee Chand broke her own record 100m record at the National Open Athletics Championships in the semi. She clocked 11.22 seconds which was better than her 11.26 at the Asian Championships.

PTI

She then won the gold by clocking a time of 11.25 seconds.

She also got a step closer to the qualification mark for the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.

PTI

The qualification mark is 11.15 seconds and deadline is June next year.

So she's 0.07 seconds off the mark and getting closer. Dutee is certainly a medal hopeful at Tokyo and one hopes she can make the cut soon.

Don't Miss 13.1 K SHARES 1.7 K SHARES 1.4 K SHARES 926 SHARES

With Inputs From PTI.
